Package com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccessToken
    This class represents an Authentication OAuth2 token created in Stormpath.
    AccessTokenList
    A CollectionResource containing AccessToken instances.
    AccessTokenRequestAuthenticator
    Authenticates an API request attempting to obtain a new OAuth Access Token.
    AccessTokenResult
    An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API specifically for the purpose of obtaining a new OAuth Access Token (eg via a OAuth 2 Client Credentials Grant Type request).
    AuthenticationRequestFactory<T extends Oauth2AuthenticationRequestBuilder>
    This interface defines the method to create a Oauth2AuthenticationRequestBuilders.
    GrantAuthenticationToken
    A GrantAuthenticationToken instance reflects the result of executing an Authentication Request to create or refresh an AccessToken.
    GrantRequest
    Interface defining the operations supported by both PasswordGrantRequest and RefreshGrantRequest.
    JwtAuthenticationRequest
    This class represents a JWT request which can be later validated either locally or against the Stormpath Server.
    JwtAuthenticationRequestBuilder
    A JWT-specific Oauth2AuthenticationRequestBuilder.
    JwtAuthenticationRequestFactory
    Factory used to construct JwtAuthenticationRequestBuilder instances
    JwtAuthenticationResult
    This class stores the information received after a AccessToken authentication request.
    JwtAuthenticator
    This class is used to authenticate a Json Web Token against Stormpath.
    JwtAuthenticatorFactory
    A JWT-specific Authenticator Factory.
    Oauth2AuthenticationRequest
    Interface denoting Oauth2 Authentication Requests.
    Oauth2AuthenticationRequestBuilder<T extends Oauth2AuthenticationRequest>
    Utility class used to build Oauth2AuthenticationRequest instances.
    Oauth2AuthenticationResult
    Interface denoting Oauth2 Authentication Response obtained as a consequence of a Oauth2AuthenticationRequest.
    Oauth2Authenticator<T extends Oauth2AuthenticationResult>
    Interface defining the operations that every Oauth2 Authenticator must support.
    Oauth2AuthenticatorFactory<T extends Oauth2Authenticator>
    Interface to be implemented as a factory for Oauth2Authenticators.
    OauthAuthenticationResult
    An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API (eg REST API) via OAuth 2.
    OauthGrantAuthenticationResult
    Contains the resultant AccessToken and all its related properties after a successful Grant Authentication request.
    OauthPolicy
    An OauthPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects of the OAuth tokens associated with an Application
    OauthRequestAuthenticator
    An OAuth-specific ApiRequestAuthenticator that implements the Builder design pattern to allow customization of how the authentication attempt is processed.
    PasswordGrantAuthenticationRequestFactory
    Factory used to construct PasswordGrantRequestBuilder instances.
    PasswordGrantAuthenticator
    Interface denoting a Password Grant-specific Oauth2Authenticator.
    PasswordGrantAuthenticatorFactory
    A Password Grant-specific Authenticator Factory.
    PasswordGrantRequest
    This class represents a request for Stormpath to authenticate an Account and exchange its credentials for a valid Oauth 2.0 access token.
    PasswordGrantRequestBuilder
    Utility class to build PasswordGrantRequestBuilder instances.
    RefreshAuthenticationRequestFactory
    Factory used to construct RefreshGrantRequestBuilder instances
    RefreshGrantAuthenticator
    This class is used to refresh an OAuth 2.0 token created in Stormpath.
    RefreshGrantAuthenticatorFactory
    A Refresh Grant-specific Authenticator Factory.
    RefreshGrantRequest
    This class represents a request for Stormpath to create new Oauth 2.0 access tokens for a previously authenticated account.
    RefreshGrantRequestBuilder
    Builder that can construct RefreshGrantRequest instances.
    RefreshToken
    This interfaces denotes a specific kind of AccessToken: a Refresh Token.
    RefreshTokenList
    A CollectionResource containing AccessToken instances.
    ResourceRequestAuthenticator
    Authenticates a client request to an API resource (URI) endpoint based on the presence of an OAuth Access Token in the request.
    ScopeFactory
    A ScopeFactory allows you to define application-specific scopes (aka 'permissions') granted to a successfully authenticated Account making an OAuth request.
    TokenResponse
    Response data to be returned to an OAuth client as a result of processing a successful Client Password Authentication Request as defined in the OAuth 2 specification, Section 2.3.1.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Authenticators
    Static utility/helper class serving Oauth2AuthenticatorFactorys.
    Oauth2Requests
    Static utility/helper methods serving Grant Authentication Request Builders.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RequestLocation
    The possible locations in an HTTP request where an OAuth 2 bearer token may be found and used for authenticating the request.
